duties_responsibilities.duty: Prospect and onboard trade customers, drive incremental sales, and identify strategic marketing & partnership opportunities.
Introduce, pitch, and drive new Woven trade business to prospective trade customers including interior designers, architects, home stagers, event planners, stylists, and design influencers.
Generate incremental revenue by developing meaningful relationships with existing trade customers.
Meet and exceed quarterly sales goals through strategic sales funnel and pipeline management.
Partner with Marketing on identifying and maximizing trade and design influencer content creation & collaboration opportunities.
Provide dedicated product and client support to Woven trade customers by helping them purchase product for upcoming projects.
Stay informed within the design and digital/social media community, attend/travel for client visits, industry events, pop-up opportunities as needed.
